title: Dram Cigars, Balvenie and a Connecticut Tortuga
itunes:title: Dram Cigars, Balvenie and a Connecticut Tortuga
description:
Victor Vitale will once again be joining us on The Cigar Authority and he will introduce us to his new Tortuga Connecticut which we will smoke on air.

In the second hour we will smoke Dram cigars which is a new cigar that is specially blended to pair with whiskey. We will be pairing these new cigars with some Balvenie.

Join us for all the madness that is The Cigar Authority.
